name: Evaryth
description:
Evarayth

Evaryth 3 is First-Person Shooter game.

Controls:

WASD movement, CTRL to crouch,  Space to jump, 1 - Rifle, 2 - Pistol, 3 - Knife, F - Inspect Knife.

 DEV NOTES

This is Duo project created in 3 days because of youtube user comment.

Install Instructions : Simply Extract .zip to a location and/or folder of your choice and play Evaryth.

Game Version: 1.0

If game will continue growing I will work on multiplayer and add some new gamemodes.
